page.title: 03A TENANT FARMER BY HIS SON
page.content: {1.}Name Mr E Rowland Bridgetown Farm {2.}Farm has 250 acres which support 5 cows and 100 bull beef.He wants the cows for the milk and the beef to sell at Â£200 to Â£300 each.He also keeps about 450 sheep which are sold for wool and food. {3.}The crops he grows are oats ,barley wheat and peas.Oats for food for animals, wheat and barley to sell to make bread or breakfast cereal. {4.}His crop rotation is that he cuts 140 acres of forage land three times a year for forage grass. He has 70 acres of arable land for peas, barley ,wheat and oats. {5.}He uses 3 tractor, 2 ploughs for turning earth, 1 combine harvester for both cutting and separating corn,a manure spreader,a potato tiller for planting potatoes and 8 trailers.
